sections.heading: Appeal; procedure.An appeal may be taken from any final decision of the director, and the appeal shall be in accordance with the Administrative Procedure Act
sections.text: SourceLaws 1971, LB 939, § 9;Laws 1972, LB 1435, § 8;Laws 1974, LB 1029, § 6;Laws 1979, LB 321, § 3;Laws 1988, LB 352, § 174.Cross ReferencesA
